definition: to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten

sentences.english: When they tighten their belts, austerity ripples out and chokes growth.
sentences.chinese: 當他們束緊褲腰帶，簡樸生活會波及到經濟增長。

sentences.english: I drew my coat around me and tightened its belt and as I did so I glanced at Parry's shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我拉緊外套，束緊腰帶，這時，我瞥了一眼帕裏的鞋。

sentences.english: The chain surrounded on the back of heel band provides perfect and tight attachment of shoe last to the band.
sentences.chinese: 後跟束緊器鏈條環抱皮套設計，充分發揮束緊力功能。

sentences.english: The chain surrounded on the back of heel band provides perfect and tight attachment of shoe last to the band.
sentences.chinese: 後跟束緊器鏈條環抱皮套設計，充分發揮束緊力功能。

sentences.english: This increases incentive costs and is a negative effect of private benefits.
sentences.chinese: 私利的存在，束緊了這一約束。

sentences.english: The main strap can be tightened with a pretty simple tug on the inside lever.
sentences.chinese: 主要的束帶可以藉由簡單的扳動中央撥杆來束緊。

sentences.english: The priest girded up his clothing and stepped into the river to show the people that he had no fear.
sentences.chinese: 祭司束緊了衣服走進河中，向人民表示他不怕死。

sentences.english: The girl girded up his clothing and stepped into the river.
sentences.chinese: 女孩束緊了衣服走進河中。

sentences.english: The band is made tighter or looser to change the size of the pouch.
sentences.chinese: 通過束緊或放鬆束胃帶來改變袋子的體積大小。

sentences.english: Further, the restraint sleeve is fine in air permeability and is favorable for dissipating heat of the forearms.
sentences.chinese: 另外，束緊套的透氣性好，利於小臂的熱量散發。

sentences.english: The coat is belted at the waist.
But not at liberty to tighten the thigh.
sentences.chinese: 大腿卻不能隨意束緊的。
